titleStmt.title: A word of counsel, in the love of God, to the persecuting magistrates and clergy, for them to read and consider. But chiefly to those of the city and county of Gloucester ...
titleStmt.author: Townsend, Theophila.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: 29th 11th Month 1687 [brace] Theophila Townsend.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
"A few words to the inhabitants of the town of Cirencester (or else-where) for them to read and consider." -- p. 9-12.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
